Leading charities today plead with Boris Johnson to protect cancer sufferers after millions were abandoned during the first Covid-19 lockdown.

articles.author: Department for Digital, Culture, Media & Sport
articles.title: Social media giants agree package of measures with UK Government to tackle vaccine disinformation - GOV.UK
articles.description: Platforms and UK government agree a package of measures to reduce vaccine disinformation
articles.content:
• Platforms endorse the principle that no company should be profiting from COVID-19 vaccine mis/disinformation and commit to swifter responses to flagged content
